title: Motley Fool Money: 09.03.2010
description: We dig into the latest jobs and retail numbers and how Mariner Energy’s explosion is affecting oil stocks.  Plus, why did Dell & HP have a bidding war over an unprofitable company?  Should Netflix be scared of Apple TV?  And can you pass our Labor Day food quiz?
